page.title: 08Golf in St. Andrews
page.content: St. Andrews is renowned as the "Home of Golf".The most famous course in the town is{The Old Course}over which the British Open Golf Championship is regularly played. In St.Andrews today there are four 18 hole courses,{The Eden, The New, The {Old}and{The Jubilee.}There is one 9 hole course called{Balgove.} There is an outdoor practice ground and in the Old Course Golf and Country Club there are indoor practice facilities, including driving ranges and a bunker. There are three Golf Clubs for men --- {The St. Andrews Club, The New Club and {The Royal and Ancient Club}and for ladies there are two ---{St. Rules and {St. Regulus.
